text: Oleg Yuryevich Siniavin (; born 8 July 1995) is a Russian sprint canoeist.Profile He won a medal at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships.2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships results ==References== ==External links== * Oleg Siniavin at the Russian Canoe Federation Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in kayak Category:Russian male canoeists
title: Oleg Siniavin
